sentences.en: -- There is also potential for exploiting untouched arable land resources.
sentences.cn: -- 开发后备耕地资源有潜力.

sentences.en: An earth - rock mountainous township, less arable land, rich in coal resources.
sentences.cn: 该乡属土石山区, 耕地较少, 但煤炭资源较丰富.

sentences.en: arable land (=  land that is suitable for growing crops  )
Arable sheep farming went out of fashion.
sentences.cn: 靠农业养羊不再风行了.

sentences.en: Do you know how much arable land has been desolated?
sentences.cn: 你知道什么每年有多少土地荒漠化 吗 ?

sentences.en: Further on, the wood of Ficuzza broke the savage monotony of arable plain.
sentences.cn: 远处有一片“翡古萨”森林, 这才打破了尽是农田所造成的极单调的气氛.

sentences.en: He had nearly a thousand acres of grazing and arable land.
sentences.cn: 他有将近1,000公顷的草场和耕地。

sentences.en: In this area arable farming is a hazardous practice.
sentences.cn: 在这个地区,可耕种的作物完全是碰运气的.

sentences.en: It is too dangerous and any arable land, if he owns it, is too precious.
sentences.cn: 任何一片可耕种的土地, 要是他能弄到手,那就太宝贵啦.

sentences.en: Rice acidic to slightly acidic soil reaction, permeability good, arable was good.
sentences.cn: 水稻土呈酸性至微酸性反应, 通透性好, 可耕性良好.

sentences.en: Since the pollution is getting worse, the arable lands become very cherished.
sentences.cn: 因为污染越来越严重, 可耕种土地变得非常珍贵.

sentences.en: The arable land not suitable for farming, irrigation, and drainage.
sentences.cn: 一耕地丘形不适于农事工作或不利于灌溉 、 排水者.

sentences.en: The biggest problem of Chinese farmers is the shortage of arable land.
sentences.cn: 目前,中国农民面临的最大问题是缺乏适于耕种的土地.

sentences.en: The terrain changed quickly from arable land to desert.
sentences.cn: 那个地带很快就从耕地变成了沙漠。

sentences.en: There is also potential for exploiting untouched arable land resources.
sentences.cn: 开发后备耕地资源有潜力.

sentences.en: Urban area had change a little and Arable land has been restored.
sentences.cn: 城镇用地面积变化不大,耕地面积也有所恢复.
